dt-example.title: Pane Customisation
dt-example.info:
This is the searchPanes extension for DataTables. It allows results to be filtered based on the values of columns.
This example shows the activation of paging the panes by setting the searchPanes dtOpts property for `-init paging` to have a value of true and setting the `-init pagingType` to have a value of `'numbers'`. It is also allowing the `-init info` of the third columns pane to be true. The default for `-init searching` is false and `-init info` is false. This occurs on all of the panes, the `-init info` is displayed only on the second column's pane.
